Enum.Name: NSWindowToolbarStyle
Enum.Description: Styles that determine the appearance and location of the toolbar in relation to the title bar.

Cases.Name: NSWindowToolbarStyleAutomatic
Cases.Description: A style indicating that the system determines the toolbar’s appearance and location.

Cases.Name: NSWindowToolbarStyleExpanded
Cases.Description: A style indicating that the toolbar appears below the window title.

Cases.Name: NSWindowToolbarStylePreference
Cases.Description: A style indicating that the toolbar appears below the window title with toolbar items centered in the toolbar.

Cases.Name: NSWindowToolbarStyleUnified
Cases.Description: A style indicating that the toolbar appears next to the window title.

Cases.Name: NSWindowToolbarStyleUnifiedCompact
Cases.Description: A style indicating that the toolbar appears next to the window title and with reduced margins to allow more focus on the window’s contents.
